alert.note: Alert for Hunterdon; Somerset (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 09 at 8:51PM EST until March 11 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM FRIDAY TO 10 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches, with the highest amounts across the higher elevations in the northern portions of each county. * WHERE...In New Jersey, Hunterdon and Somerset. In Pennsylvania, Lehigh and Northampton. * WHEN...From 1 PM Friday to 10 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
